Here is a script for you to update `persistent_peers` setting with these peers in `config.toml`.

```
PEERS=bbea7242ddd3bafcfe1f5ac12b4a112d5bf04176@65.108.194.26:56656,e7bb31c8fdd8d26a739bfd87cdf3ba7a8f90406e@65.21.145.228:31656,15d2f1bc2bfaa143388465ea115c59e5ce6e77dc@65.109.39.223:26656,2641ddcf28d8adf448edb573de1efba0b6971d9e@178.154.222.128:26656,b441c4bfa215e8b46fe058e7a4ce4886d87860e3@132.145.54.94:26656,22d2b3587e2ce6ae750c189b12461e7315d08ae4@167.235.151.119:26656,cf94099349980f9593a3f0362c85fe7c6eda8b14@8.219.48.59:26656,3f658dc173540479ba70f58f27d60fa9de83378a@195.201.165.123:21056,52eee2c34150d621312087e49f118969472ba55f@149.102.137.192:26656,1de2abae74a4c5fd7d96d9869ef02187f81498f0@134.209.238.66:26656,8e4938aa6561695326f61f432ea2b2a53a428205@95.217.118.96:27161,2fac17056c78f89c3eed11cffcc4d750767702b5@178.79.190.160:31656,05a08122a117d7a6ff28b20da58b179f5caff210@62.171.161.33:29656,4aa182ce191cd089929544fe0612d33a02a2cde9@46.17.250.145:26656,de1f980cc59bdb2457202768d4b4d964d783789e@167.235.21.165:36656,e0c6b7e238af380c8b531ffd3e367fa1051f9c99@142.132.199.27:21066,5b4482bfe02384184470070c3d3a4465cf0c18d4@144.91.82.61:31656,47555eddb67b1f858cef8df5c2c917b3bf2c8df3@116.202.236.115:11056,aa8c0064e866dc57b341a389006df8925a0718fe@5.161.55.130:31656,cd13283cd646d71fae76aa2e54ac1c43ea478d58@5.161.41.237:26656,3a9defcd334cefd6b8143ec1ecd8be5e51f1c1c5@95.214.53.46:46656,672c72f28ed5b2a409c1edc2be760e38f76ee4f7@207.244.253.244:36656,ec5127072c252f7246fb66f7e7762423a23ff6bd@154.12.228.93:31656,1dae68f061204fe2c10e9476239c0333258889e7@65.109.31.114:2460,33fd6e5062baedde026514357b6865f1fbc74c4f@185.144.99.15:26656,40d19b7f93b6a2e01c727712b0d2a06ae7ff262a@185.173.157.251:26656,ed12770cba24bfc5ea73d470115067bde00d8291@51.79.28.76:26656,d92268c246e02a54103f7098b901b876c88f006e@5.161.130.108:26656,3990d5a402ca8f9e53441b02e22f4558c5c85fc5@65.108.44.149:27756,f3eaab835c004c3bc7119097de649cf35a14b48d@45.88.106.199:26656,91089c0911b59f59fe2ec79fdae017f9beefbbfd@65.108.101.158:26656,3fecdd600aabf021999a5897c8e16da8406d3e95@167.235.154.14:26656,5b6356defbfc7227035698d6af7d686
```
